document_title: Congenital heart disease: Signs of recognition, screening and treatment
subsection_name: benh-tim-bam-sinh.json_7_Caring for children with congenital heart disease
subsection_content:
Children with congenital heart diseases need attention and care. Most children can still participate in normal activities and play, but need to limit or avoid vigorous sports, competitive competitions, etc.
In addition, children need to be fully vaccinated and comply with a regular health check-up schedule to help detect risk factors for complications early and take timely intervention measures.
